settings.heading: How long does it take for me to receive my order?
settings.copy: Orders ship from our facility in the U.S. within 1-2 business days of receipt and generally arrive at your doorstep 3-4 days later. International orders ship via DHL Expedited Worldwide with delivery duty paid.  Fast. Simple. An experience on par with what you've come to expect of us. You will receive an email with a tracking number when your package ships, so you can follow your order to your doorstep.

settings.heading: What countries do you ship to?
settings.copy:
We ship to the United States, Canada, all of The EU and almost all of Europe, Australia, New Zealand, UAE, Qatar, Bahrain and Singapore presently with many more markets coming very soon.

If you're looking to purchase from another country please drop us a line and let us know which one, as we keep a list to help prioritize where to expand to next! help@calderalab.com

settings.heading: What’s your return policy?
settings.copy: We stand behind all purchases with a 60-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're unhappy for any reason, just contact us we’ll ensure you’re satisfied!
